thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Antiquated
thread.title_full: Antiquated - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Toddtoni
title: Antiquated
text: This hotel was probably nice in its day but that was probably in 1980 or earlier. Everything is old... The air and heater, the wallpaper, the bathrooms, the towels, the carpet. It was just nasty to me. The only good thing was the sheets, the bar service downstairs and the breakfast. It's also a good location for midtown, but I wouldn't stay here again.
